briefTitle: A Study Evaluating JUVÉDERM® VOLUMA® XC Injectable Gel for Correction of Temple Hollowing in Adult Participants ≥ 22 Years Old
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Evaluator-blinded, Randomized, Parallel-group, Controlled Study of the Safety and Effectiveness of JUVÉDERM® VOLUMA® XC Injectable Gel for Correction of Temple Hollowing

arms.label: No Treatment then JUVÉDERM® VOLUMA® XC

summary: The objectives of this study are to evaluate the safety and effectiveness of Juvederm® Voluma® XC injectable gel in adult participants seeking correction of temple hollowing

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With ≥ 1-grade Improvement From Baseline in the Validated Allergan Temple Hollowing Scale (ATHS) Based on Evaluating Investigator (EI) Assessment at Month 3

effectByArm.arm: No Treatment Then JUVÉDERM® VOLUMA® XC
